name: Flipnote Player
tagline: Plays Flipnote Studio DSi files(ppm) from local storage or directly from any DSi hatena private server
body:
### Flipnote Player - by pbsds
![](http://i.imgur.com/D9MHecU.png)
Flipnote Player can play the flipnotes made on NDSi from local storage or directly from any hatena private server, like Sudomemo or any server set up using my proof-of-concept [hatena server](https://github.com/pbsds/hatena-server), like [these listed over here](https://github.com/pbsds/hatena-server/wiki/Server-list), [this one](http://gbatemp.net/threads/flipnote-hatena-server-for-dsi-by-pbsds.361279/page-3#post-5397530) or [Sudomemo](http://www.sudomemo.net/). Possibly from the new 3DS Hatena in the future aswell?

Download(Source + win32 compile): [here](https://pbsds.github.io/compiles/Flipnote-Player.7z)

Source: [here](https://github.com/pbsds/Flipnote-Player)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
